message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $2,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $2,000,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,500,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
